summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.2°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 642 m), light levels (up 3023 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1592 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5051 lux) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and very little to no wind will be present. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
